item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Shankar's Telugu debut crossed lifetime collections of his much-hyped Kamal Haasan-starrer.

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s maiden Telugu film Game Changer has crossed the lifetime collection of his previous film, Indian 2. As of 7 PM, the film has grossed ₹85.09 crore net in India.

  • On its opening day, Game Changer collected ₹51 crore net in India.
  • Day 2 showed a significant drop with a 57.65% decrease, earning only ₹21.6 crore net.
  • The film registered an 18.01% occupancy for its morning shows.
  • The competition includes Balakrishna’s Daaku Maharaaj and Venkatesh-starrer Sankranthiki Vasthunam.

“The film explores corruption in electoral politics with Suryah playing a corrupt politician.”

The film's performance has been underwhelming for a Sankranthi release, and its future collection remains uncertain as it faces competition from other films released during the festival season.

item.title: Ajith Kumar’s team clinches 3rd place in Dubai 24H race; Madhavan hails him as ‘the one and only’. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ajith Kumar’s team clinches 3rd place in Dubai 24H race; Madhavan hails him as ‘the one and only’. Watch

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar has triumphed in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race, securing third place in the 991 category and earning the Spirit of the Race recognition in the GT4 category.

  • Ajith Kumar Racing by Bas Koeten secured third place in the 991 category.
  • Ajith received recognition for the Spirit of the Race in the GT4 category.
  • Actor Madhavan praised Ajith’s accomplishment on social media, calling him “the one and only.”
  • Ajith's participation served as a boost after a recent training accident.
“What a remarkable comeback after an accident due to a brake failure.” - Suresh Chandra

This victory is celebrated widely on social media, with fans showing their support and pride in Ajith Kumar's achievements.

item.title: Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident - Times Now
item.description:
Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident

Publication Date: Sunday

Source: TNN

Actor Ajith Kumar secured the 3rd spot at the 24H Dubai Race on Sunday, despite facing a car crash during the practice session. Initially contemplating withdrawal, his spirit led him back to the competition, surprising fans and making his team proud.

Key Points

  • Ajith Kumar finished 3rd in the 991 category and received a special mention in the GT4 category.
  • The accident occurred during practice due to brake failure, but Kumar was unharmed.
  • Despite initial reluctance to participate post-accident, he ultimately decided to race.
  • The team emphasized Kumar's well-being and their assessment of the crash before he returned.

Notable Quotes

“Double whammy for Ajith Kumar 3rd place in the 991 category and Spirit of the race in the gt4 category. What a remarkable comeback after an accident due to a break failure.” - Ajith Kumar's Manager

This incident highlights his dedication to motorsport and the support of his team.

item.title: Salman Khan recalls Raveena Tandon fighting with him on-set, reacts to Rasha and Aman’s debut: ‘Main wahi ka wahi hoon’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Salman Khan recalls Raveena Tandon fighting with him on-set, reacts to Rasha and Aman’s debut: ‘Main wahi ka wahi hoon’

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured Salman Khan welcoming debutant actors Rasha Thadani and Aman Devgan, while Raveena Tandon joined as a special guest, sparking nostalgia and playful banter between the two stars.

  • Salman Khan acknowledged his personal connection with debutants Rasha Thadani and Aman Devgan.
  • Raveena Tandon and Salman Khan reminisced about their past work together, with amusing stories from their filming days.
  • Salman humorously commented on their unchanged status, saying he remains the same after all these years.
  • Memorable throwback photos were shared, including a young Rasha with Salman.
  • The episode also features cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal as a guest.
“Tumhari mummy mujhse bohot jhagda karti thi” - Salman Khan

This episode highlights the fun chemistry and nostalgia among Bollywood stars, celebrating both their past and the new generation of talent in the industry.

item.title: Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Bollywood star Preity Zinta shared an update about her family's safety, expressing her heartbreak over the devastation in the area.

  • Preity Zinta reassured fans that her family is currently safe.
  • She expressed concern for friends and families affected by the wildfires.
  • Zinta shared a poignant message about the experience of living through the fire crisis.
  • Other celebrities, including Nora Fatehi and Priyanka Chopra, also commented on their experiences during the wildfires.

“I never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA, friends & families either evacuated or put on high alert,” — Preity Zinta

The wildfires are causing significant damage, impacting thousands, including several Hollywood celebrities.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule Reloaded: Allu Arjun shares unseen footage from the film, including that Japan scene. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Reloaded: Allu Arjun shares unseen footage from the film, including that Japan scene. Watch

Publication Date: Jan 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sukumar's highly anticipated sequel, Pushpa 2: The Rule Reloaded, is set to release on January 17 with an additional 20 minutes of footage. Allu Arjun shares a teaser that reveals unseen scenes, including a significant Japan sequence.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule Reloaded will feature 20 minutes of new footage starting January 17.
  • Allu Arjun posted a teaser that includes unseen footage and context to the film's opening fight sequence.
  • The film has already grossed over ₹1831 crore in 32 days since its original release on December 5.
  • The teaser hints at extending storylines, including a character believed to be dead.
  • Some sequences filmed in Japan will be elaborated on in the new footage.
“Those who have said that all the P2 will make sense in P3 will have a good time now,” a fan commented.

The release of additional footage is highly anticipated and promises to enrich the narrative of Pushpa 2.

item.title: Tabu joins the cast of Akshay Kumar starrer Bhooth Bangla; actress drops pic - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Tabu Joins Akshay Kumar's 'Bhooth Bangla' Cast

Publication Date: Recent Update
Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood fans have reason to celebrate as popular actress Tabu returns to the horror-comedy genre with Akshay Kumar starrer Bhooth Bangla. She announced her involvement via social media, much to the excitement of fans.

  • Tabu's return to horror-comedy follows her success in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2.
  • The film reunites Akshay Kumar with director Priyadarshan after 14 years.
  • Filming is currently taking place in Jaipur.
  • Fans are thrilled about the crossover potential between characters from Bhool Bhulaiyaa.
“Hum yahan bandh hain.” - Tabu

The ensemble cast also includes Paresh Rawal, with production by Balaji Telefilms and Cape of Good Films. The film is scheduled for theatrical release on April 2, 2026.

item.title: California wildfire: Kim Kardashian demands pay raise for firefighters, $1 per hour since 1984 - Mint
item.description:
California wildfire: Kim Kardashian demands pay raise for firefighters, $1 per hour since 1984

Publication Date: Not specifiedSource: Live Mint

Kim Kardashian expressed gratitude to firefighters in California, emphasizing the plight of incarcerated individuals who fight wildfires for just $1 per hour.

Key Points:

  • The death toll from the wildfires has reached 16, with over 12,000 structures destroyed.
  • Kardashian highlighted the dangerous conditions faced by incarcerated firefighters.
  • She revealed that their pay has not changed since 1984, despite inflation and worsening fire conditions.
  • Previously proposed pay increase to $5/hour was denied.
  • Kardashian called on California Governor Gavin Newsom to raise the pay for incarcerated firefighters.
“I am urging to do what no Governor has done in 4 decades, and raise the incarcerated firefighter pay to a rate that honors a human being risking their life to save our lives and homes.”

In conclusion, Kim Kardashian's message calls for reform in the treatment and compensation of incarcerated firefighters who bravely face the dangers of wildfires.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan film sees a steep drop on day 2 in India - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan Film Sees a Steep Drop on Day 2 in India

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Game Changer witnessed a significant drop at the Indian box office on its second day with collections plummeting to Rs. 24.50 crore, reflecting a 60% decline overall.

  • The two-day cumulative box office gross stands at approximately Rs. 83.50 crore in India.
  • Telugu states experienced an over 70% drop, accumulating only Rs. 12 crore on the second day.
  • Tamil Nadu's performance was disappointing, grossing a mere Rs. 4 crore over the two days.
  • The film's fate was sealed even before release due to its high budget and insufficient pre-release recoveries.
  • Holiday opportunities in Telugu states may help, but expectations are low.
“The drop on the second day has sealed the fate of the film.”

In conclusion, despite the holiday period, the financial prospects for Game Changer appear bleak as it grapples with poor box office performance.

item.description:

This article presents a poll asking readers for their opinions on the newly released Telugu movie, Daaku Maharaaj.

  • The poll question invites readers to share their thoughts on the movie.

"Poll: What's your opinion on Daaku Maharaaj movie?"

The outcome of this poll may indicate the general reception of the film among audiences.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan takes a hilarious dig at Ajay Devgn while praising nephew Aaman Devgn's dance m - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan takes a hilarious dig at Ajay Devgn while praising nephew Aaman Devgn's dance moves

Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The recent episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured Rasha Thadani and Aaman Devgn, who impressed Salman Khan with their dance moves. The host jokingly critiqued Ajay Devgn while acknowledging the duo's talent.

  • Salman Khan praised Aaman Devgn and Rasha Thadani for their excellent dance skills.
  • Salman made a humorous remark about Ajay Devgn's reaction to Aaman's dancing.
  • Raveena Tandon joined the stage, leading to a dance to a classic Bollywood song.
  • The episode included playful moments and interactions among the contestants.
“Ajay will agree,” said Salman, leading to laughter between him and Aaman.

Overall, the episode highlighted the fun interactions of the contestants and their performances, leaving an entertaining impression on the audience.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Day 1: With Only 7% Lesser Morning Occupancy, Nandamuri Balakrishna Misses To Beat His Last Sankranti Release! - Koimoi
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Day 1: With Only 7% Lesser Morning Occupancy

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Nandamuri Balakrishna’s first arrival of the year has started on a good note in the theaters. Daaku Maharaaj has opened at the box office with good occupancy, slightly lower than his last release.

Key Points:

  • The film has recorded a morning occupancy of 59.89%, which is 7% less than Nandamuri Balakrishna’s last film.
  • His previous film, Veera Simha Reddy, opened at 64% in the morning shows on its opening day.
  • The occupancy is better than Ram Charan’s Game Changer, which had 47%.
  • The film has received mixed reviews and features notable stars.
The morning occupancy for Daaku Maharaaj has been registered at 59.89%. This is only 7% less than Nandamuri Balakrishna’s last Sankranti release.

Overall, Daaku Maharaaj is off to a positive start, with hopes that it will maintain this momentum throughout the day.

item.title: After Dune: Prophecy, Tabu reunites with Hera Pheri team Akshay Kumar, Priyadarshan for Bhooth Bangla. See her post - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Tabu Reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan for Bhooth Bangla

Publication Date: Jan 12, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Tabu, known for her role in Dune: Prophecy, announces her participation in the horror comedy Bhooth Bangla, reuniting with Akshay Kumar and director Priyadarshan.

  • Tabu shared a social media post revealing the film's clapboard.
  • She returns to the horror comedy genre, having previously starred in successful films such as Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 and Golmaal Again.
  • The film is produced by Balaji Motion Pictures and is scheduled for release on April 2, 2026.
“Hum yahan bandh hain (we are trapped here).” - Tabu

The reunion of these collaborators promises a nostalgic appeal for fans of their previous works together.

item.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 9: Profits Boost Over 350%, Is Now The 3rd Highest Grossing Re-Run In India! - Koimoi
item.description:
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 9: Profits Boost Over 350%, Is Now The 3rd Highest Grossing

Publication Date: January 12, 2025
Source: Koimoi

Despite new releases, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani re-release continues to be a hit among audiences, with significant profits reported at the box office.

Key Points

  • The film earned 1.40 crores on its second Saturday, a 21% increase from the opening day.
  • Overall collections have reached 204.48 crores after 9 days.
  • The film is now the 3rd highest-grossing re-release in India.
  • It surpassed the collections of Sholay 3D and is only behind Ghilli and Tumbbad.
  • Return on investment stands at 354%.
“YJHD has gained cult-classic status for its fairytale romance.”

This successful re-release reaffirms the film's lasting popularity and nostalgic value among fans.

item.title: Madha Gaja Raja movie review: Vishal, Santhanam power this Sundar C throwback to simpler yet sus times - The Indian Express
item.description:
Madha Gaja Raja movie review

Date: January 2025 | Source: Indian Express

The review discusses the unique circumstances of viewing 'Madha Gaja Raja', a film that was delayed for 12 years and addresses how it holds up a decade later. It captures the humorous essence and critiques of the film's approach to comedy and narrative.

  • The film is directed by Sundar C and features a mix of nostalgia and humor.
  • Vishal and Santhanam deliver strong performances, especially in comedic roles.
  • The narrative follows Raja's antics with friends and includes action sequences that slow the pacing.
  • The review highlights the irreverent humor characteristic of Sundar C’s films.
  • Despite its flaws, the film successfully entertains with comedic elements and nostalgic references.
The movie’s strength is comedy, and any time it moves away from that, it falters.

Overall, while the film reflects a mix of dated elements and timeless humor, it shows Sundar C’s enduring capability to engage audiences through laughter.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Day 2 (All Languages): Ram Charan Beats His Acharya With 65% Higher 2-Day Total! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Day 2 (All Languages): Ram Charan Beats His Acharya With 65% Higher 2-Day Total!

Publication Date: January 11, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan and Kiara Advani’s political action thriller Game Changer is enjoying a decent run at the box office, scoring the biggest Sankranti opening of all time, though it has seen a dip in collections on Day 2.

Key Points:

  • Game Changer earned 22 crores on Day 2, suffering a 59% drop from Day 1's 54 crores.
  • The film had a total collection of 76 crores over the first two days.
  • Game Changer is 65% ahead of Ram Charan's previous film Acharya in terms of the two-day total.
  • The film, directed by S Shankar, was released on January 10, 2024, coinciding with the Sankranti holiday.
“Game Changer must make the most of the weekend holiday to achieve the box office milestone!”

Given its substantial budget of 400-500 crores, the film has potential for high returns if box office trends improve.

item.title: 'Game Changer' box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer mints a whopping Rs 72.5 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer mints a whopping Rs 72.5 crore

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Times of India

'Game Changer', directed by Shankar, hit the screens on January 10, 2025, and has garnered significant earnings. The film received positive reviews, especially for Ram Charan's performance.

  • The film grossed Rs 51 crore on its opening day.
  • On the second day, it earned Rs 21.5 crore, bringing the total to Rs 72.5 crore.
  • Second day earnings breakdown: Rs 12.7 crore (Telugu), Rs 7 crore (Hindi), Rs 1.7 crore (Tamil), Rs 10 lakhs (Kannada).
  • The overall occupancy rates were strong, with 31.19% in Telugu theatres.
  • The film features Ram Charan as an IAS officer fighting against corruption.
“The film is likely to dominate the box office during the upcoming festive season.”

The success of 'Game Changer' suggests a promising run at the box office, with expectations of sustained earnings in the weeks to come.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar episode draws netizens' ire for setting narratives against Karan Veer Mehra; fans declare him winner - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar Episode Sparks Controversy Over Karan Veer Mehra

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: BollywoodLife

Last night's episode of Bigg Boss 18 sparked outrage among fans, as many accused the show's producers and host Salman Khan of bias against contestant Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Netizens assert that Karan is being unfairly targeted in the show.
  • Karan's responses to criticism during the episode have been praised for their confidence and clarity.
  • Fans are rallying on social media, supporting Karan's stance and calling for votes.
“What is also being hailed as the line of the season -- 'main apni nazar mein sahi hona chahiye... duniya toh bhagwaan se bhi pareshaan hai...'” – Karan Veer Mehra

Despite criticism, Karan's supporters highlight his loyalty and integrity towards his friends in the house.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar episode draws netizens' ire for setting narratives against Karan Veer Mehra; fan - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar Episode Sparks Controversy Over Karan Veer Mehra

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: BollywoodLife

In the latest episode of Bigg Boss 18, Karan Veer Mehra faced criticism from the host Salman Khan and netizens for alleged bias against him, raising significant discussions on social media.

  • Viewers expressed outrage towards the show’s narrative against Karan.
  • Karan defended himself vigorously against Salman's accusations, stating his actions were justified.
  • Fans rallied behind Karan on platforms like Twitter and Reddit, calling for support in voting.
  • Karan’s confidence in handling the criticisms earned him widespread admiration online.
“Voting is audited and can’t be manipulated. Voting is our only power.” — ice (@misanrie)

The backlash against the show's narrative has sparked a movement among fans urging for fair treatment as the competition approaches its finale.

item.title: Game Changer worldwide box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani’s film sees massive dip, collects Rs 72.5 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer worldwide box office collection Day 2

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 - Source: Indian Express

Ram Charan and Kiara Advani’s highly anticipated film, Game Changer, has faced a significant decline in its box office collections following its release.

  • The film earned Rs 51 crore on its opening day across all languages.
  • On Day 2, the collection dropped to Rs 21.5 crore, marking a decline of 57.84%.
  • The total box office collection stands at Rs 72.5 crore in India.
  • The Telugu version has accumulated Rs 53.95 crore; the Hindi version Rs 14.5 crore; the Tamil version Rs 3.82 crore; and the Malayalam and Kannada versions Rs 0.03 crore and Rs 0.02 crore respectively.
  • Occupancy rates indicate a 31.19% occupancy for the Telugu version and 21.82% for the Hindi version.
The king’s arrival is setting the box office ablaze 🤙🏼 #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE 💥💥

Despite its promising start, the film has been criticized for allegedly inflating its Day 1 earnings, which were initially reported as Rs 186 crore worldwide.

item.title: Preity Zinta assures fans she and her family are ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: Heartbroken at the devastation - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Preity Zinta assures fans she and her family are ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires

Date: Jan 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Preity Zinta took to social media to assure her fans about her family's safety and expressed her heartbreak over the devastation.

  • Preity Zinta lives in LA with her husband and their twins.
  • She shared her concerns about the wildfires affecting friends and family.
  • Other Indian celebrities like Priyanka Chopra and Nora Fatehi also expressed their experiences and fears regarding the wildfires.
“I never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA... I’m heartbroken at the devastation around us & grateful to God that we are safe as of now,” said Preity Zinta on social media.

Preity Zinta emphasized her gratitude for the responders and shared thoughts for those affected by the fires.

item.title: Anil Ravipudi turning down Thalapathy 69 puzzles fans - 123telugu
item.description:
Anil Ravipudi Turning Down Thalapathy 69 Puzzles Fans

Published on: Jan 12, 2025 9:00 am IST

Tollywood director Anil Ravipudi, known for his successful track record, is gearing up for the release of his film Sankranthiki Vasthunnam on January 14, 2025. Recently, during a promotional event, actor VTV Ganesh revealed that Thalapathy 69 is a remake of Bhagavanth Kesari. However, Anil reportedly turned down the chance to direct Vijay.

  • Director Anil Ravipudi is preparing for the release of Sankranthiki Vasthunnam.
  • Actor VTV Ganesh disclosed Thalapathy 69 as a remake, but Anil declined to direct it.
  • Fans speculate on the reasons behind Anil's decision, pondering his preference for original stories.
  • Fans are eager for an explanation regarding his choice.
“The reason behind his decision remains unclear.”

This surprising decision has left fans puzzled and speculating about Anil's future projects.

item.title: Fateh box office collection day 2: Sonu Sood, Jacqueline Fernandez film sees minor dip on Saturday - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 2: Sonu Sood's Film Sees Minor Dip

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The action entertainer Fateh, directed by Sonu Sood, experienced a dip in box office collections on its second day, earning ₹2 crore, which is ₹40 lakhs less than its opening day.

  • Fateh earned ₹2 crore on Saturday, down from ₹2.4 crore on Friday.
  • The film faces competition from the Hindi dubbed version of S Shankar's Game Changer.
  • Ticket prices were initially set at ₹99, which contributed to better opening numbers.
  • Sonu Sood aims to donate the entire profit from the film to charity.
  • The film tackles themes of courage and cybercrime, based on real-life experiences during the COVID-19 pandemic.
“Fateh is a film made for the common man, and I wanted it to reach everyone in the most accessible way across India,” Sonu Sood said.

Despite its promising start, Fateh's performance shows that it might struggle to maintain momentum amidst stiff competition.
